surMesure.title: Bespoke
surMesure.subtitle: Your vision, our expertise
surMesure.heroText: Because every space is unique, every piece should be too. Create with us furniture that reflects you, adapted to your needs and interior.

process.title: The process
process.subtitle: From idea to realization, we guide you through every step to create the perfect piece.

steps.title: First meeting
steps.description: We discuss your project, your desires, your space and budget constraints. This is the moment to share your inspirations.

steps.title: Design
steps.description: We develop sketches and proposals. Together, we refine the design until we achieve the perfect piece.

steps.title: Material selection
steps.description: We present the available wood species. You participate in choosing the material that will bring your piece to life.

steps.title: Manufacturing
steps.description: Your piece takes shape in our workshop. We keep you informed of progress and share photos of the process.

steps.title: Delivery & Installation
steps.description: We deliver and install your piece at your home. The moment your vision becomes reality.
